scripts.buildSolarWebDebug: cd solar/src/ui/lib && npx ng build --configuration development
scripts.buildWeb: npm run buildSolarWeb && cd samples/web/app && npx ng build --configuration production
scripts.buildWebDebug: npm run buildSolarWebDebug&& cd samples/web/app && npx ng build --configuration development
scripts.build: npm run buildNet && npm run buildWeb
scripts.dev: npm run buildNetDebug && target/webapp/assets target/webapp/3rdpartylicenses.txt target/webapp/index.html target/webapp/main.js target/webapp/plotly.js target/webapp/polyfills.js target/webapp/runtime.js target/webapp/solar.svg target/webapp/styles.cssnpm run buildWebDebug
